body_html:
@VDalibard Shake hands. I meet those same problems as all you said. And didn't get better performance by using faster protobuf version neither.

@cegeme you can install the fast protobuf manually.
Download protobuf.
unzip and install like the protobuf-3.0.0-beta-2/README.md and protobuf-3.0.0-beta-2/python/README.md instruction.
And you can refer to @VDalibard said.
